FlexiPage.description: This is the custom Octopus Wealth page for person accounts.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Sync in progress

It can take up to 2 mins for certain details to update across our systems. Please wait while we get NSYNC.

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: ((1 AND 2) OR 6 OR 7) AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 8 AND 9

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: The legacy bank account details are here for reference only. Do not use them and instead rely on the details visible above.
